stanza.line: O truant Muse what shall be thy amendsamends

Both truth and beauty on my love dependsdepends
So dost thou too and therein dignifieddignified
Make answer Muse wilt thou not haply saysay
Truth needs no colour with his colour fixedfixed
Beauty no pencil beauty truth to laylay
But best is best if never intermixedintermixed
Because he needs no praise wilt thou be dumbdumb
Excuse not silence so fort lies in theethee
To make him much outlive a gilded tombtomb
And to be praised of ages yet to bebe
